name: Impossible Bottle Flip 2018
description:
Look for the right angle to flip the bottle with precision and accuracy.
Flip your bottle from one object to the next.
Be careful about power when releases the bottle and also watch out the projection angle of your Bottle.
The extreme insane challenge of 2018 flip water bottle.
Be the Master of Flip Bottle Challenge!

Plenty of Levels!
Try not to fall down!!
